column4: hello.who know if we can set our mac address to 00:00:00:00:00:00??
hello.who know if we can set our mac address to 00:00:00:00:00:00??
you cannot.
can you see me?
yes...see what??
did you see that I said no?
okay, now you do.
then how can i bypass mac filtering that only allow 00:00:00:00:00:00 to enter the router??
I guess not.
u mean there's no way??
correct
could you reconfigure your router?
in that case, you may have to reset it to factory defaults.
FYI, im remote
then you will have to be local to reset to factory defaults.
that's almost imposible
nevertheless, it will be required if you can't access the unit any other way.
that's how you described it..
would it be possible for me to clone my mac to the mac of wired client connected to the router even if im wirelessly connected??
you said that you had blocked all mac addresses except the one, so no, that would not help.
OMG what have i done?then how can the local user connected to the router using wired connection connect to internet??
isn't the mac filter just for the wireless side?
yes u r right...i almost forgot bout that
